sources.title: It Happened In Paris
sources.description: Paul, artistically-inclined son of an American millionaire, moves to Paris where he can find inspiration and study the masters. While there, he finds inspiration of a different sort in the form of the beautiful Jacqueline.

metadata.Plot: Charlie's visit to Paris, ostensibly a vacation, is really a mission to investigate a bond-forgery racket. But his agent, apache dancer Nardi is killed before she can tell him much. The case, complicated by a false murder accusation for banker's daughter Yvette, climaxes with a strange journey through the Paris sewers.
metadata.Writer: Edward T. Lowe Jr., Stuart Anthony, Philip MacDonald
metadata.Actors: Warner Oland, Mary Brian, Thomas Beck
